 Testcase#1:
a= 01000000 01011110 00001010 00010000
b= 01000000 11100010 00001110 00100100
r= 01000000 11100010 00011101 00101001




Overflow testcases:
a=01111111  11100001  11001000  01100101
b=01111111  11100001  10111010  10111001

r=overflow

Underflow testcases:
A
00000000 00010000 00000000 00000000
B
10000000 00010000 00000000 00000000

underflow does not shows due to normalizer error
